{{domxref("Element.ariaBusy")}}

> |

The ariaControls property, part of the {{domxref("ARIAMixin")}} interface, reflects the value of the aria-controls attribute, which indicates whether an element is being modified.

^ |

title: aria-controls
summary: The global aria-controls property identifies the element (or elements) whose contents or presence are controlled by the element on which this attribute is set.
